Antiplague (Lesser).name: Vaccine
Antiplague (Lesser).description:
Activate A (manipulate)

Vaccines can fortify the body's defenses against diseases. Upon drinking a vaccine, you gain a +2 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against diseases for 24 hours; this applies to your daily save against a disease's progression.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.mVgLCbZgafIylRzh]{Effect: Vaccine}

Antiplague (Moderate).name: Vaccine+
Antiplague (Moderate).description:
Activate A (manipulate)

Vaccines can fortify the body's defenses against diseases. Upon drinking a vaccine, you gain a +3 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against diseases for 24 hours; this applies to your daily save against a disease's progression.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.mVgLCbZgafIylRzh]{Effect: Vaccine}

Antiplague (Greater).name: Hi-Vaccine
Antiplague (Greater).description:
Activate A (manipulate)

Vaccines can fortify the body's defenses against diseases. Upon drinking a vaccine, you gain a +4 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against diseases for 24 hours; this applies to your daily save against a disease's progression.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.mVgLCbZgafIylRzh]{Effect: Vaccine}

Antiplague (Major).name: Hi-Vaccine+
Antiplague (Major).description:
Activate A (manipulate)

Vaccines can fortify the body's defenses against diseases. Upon drinking a vaccine, you gain a +4 item bonus to Fortitude saving throws against diseases for 24 hours; this applies to your daily save against a disease's progression.

When you drink a hi-vaccine+, you can immediately attempt a saving throw against one disease of 14th level or lower affecting you. If you succeed, you are cured of the disease.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.mVgLCbZgafIylRzh]{Effect: Vaccine}

Elixir of Life (Minor).name: Tonic
Elixir of Life (Minor).description:
Activate A (manipulate)

Tonics accelerate a living creature's natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain @Damage[1d6[healing]] Hit Points and gain +1 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.lPRuIRbu0rHBkoKY]{Effect: Healing Tonic}

Elixir of Life (Lesser).name: Tincture
Elixir of Life (Lesser).description:
Activate A (manipulate)

Tinctures accelerate a living creature's natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain @Damage[3d6+6[healing]] Hit Points and gain +1 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.lPRuIRbu0rHBkoKY]{Effect: Healing Tonic}

Elixir of Life (Moderate).name: Tincture+
Elixir of Life (Moderate).description:
Activate A (manipulate)

Tincture+'s accelerate a living creature's natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain @Damage[5d6+12[healing]] Hit Points and gain +2 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.lPRuIRbu0rHBkoKY]{Effect: Healing Tonic}

Elixir of Life (Greater).name: Mega Potion
Elixir of Life (Greater).description:
Activate A (manipulate)

Mega Potions accelerate a living creature's natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain @Damage[7d6+18[healing]] Hit Points and gain +2 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.lPRuIRbu0rHBkoKY]{Effect: Healing Tonic}

Elixir of Life (Major).name: Elixir
Elixir of Life (Major).description:
Activate A (manipulate)

Elixirs accelerate a living creature's natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain @Damage[8d6+21[healing]] Hit Points and gain +3 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.lPRuIRbu0rHBkoKY]{Effect: Healing Tonic}

Elixir of Life (True).name: Megalixir
Elixir of Life (True).description:
Activate A (manipulate)

Megalixirs accelerate a living creature's natural healing processes and immune system. Upon drinking this elixir, you regain @Damage[10d6+27[healing]] Hit Points and gain +4 item bonus to saving throws against diseases and poisons for 10 minutes.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.lPRuIRbu0rHBkoKY]{Effect: Healing Tonic}

Alchemist's Fire (Lesser).name: Fire Mote
Alchemist's Fire (Lesser).description:
Activate A Strike

Fire bombs are a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. A fire mote deals 1d8 fire damage, 1 persistent fire damage, and 1 fire splash damage.

Alchemist's Fire (Moderate).name: Bomb Fragment
Alchemist's Fire (Moderate).description:
Activate A Strike

Fire bombs are a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. A bomb fragment deals 2d8 fire damage, 2 persistent fire damage, and 2 fire splash damage. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls.

Alchemist's Fire (Greater).name: Red Gem
Alchemist's Fire (Greater).description:
Activate A Strike

Fire bombs are a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. A red gem deals 3d8 fire damage, 3 persistent fire damage, and 3 fire splash damage. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

Alchemist's Fire (Major).name: Ifrit Core
Alchemist's Fire (Major).description:
Activate A Strike

Fire bombs are a combination of volatile liquids that ignite when exposed to air. An ifrit core deals 4d8 fire damage, 4 persistent fire damage, and 4 fire splash damage. You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls.

Frost Vial (Lesser).name: Ice Mote
Frost Vial (Lesser).description:
Activate 1 Strike

The bright blue liquid reagents in this vial rapidly absorb heat when exposed to air. An ice mote deals 1d6 ice damage and 1 ice splash damage. On a hit, the target takes a –5-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.LdmzgBOTjCete4F7]{Effect: Ice Bomb}

Frost Vial (Moderate).name: Yeti Fragment
Frost Vial (Moderate).description:
Activate 1 Strike

The bright blue liquid reagents in this vial rapidly absorb heat when exposed to air. A yeti fragment deals 2d6 ice damage and 2 ice splash damage. On a hit, the target takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.LdmzgBOTjCete4F7]{Effect: Ice Bomb}

Frost Vial (Greater).name: White Gem
Frost Vial (Greater).description:
Activate 1 Strike

The bright blue liquid reagents in this vial rapidly absorb heat when exposed to air. A white gem deals 3d6 ice damage and 3 ice splash damage. On a hit, the target takes a –10-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.LdmzgBOTjCete4F7]{Effect: Ice Bomb}

Frost Vial (Major).name: Shiva Core
Frost Vial (Major).description:
Activate 1 Strike

The bright blue liquid reagents in this vial rapidly absorb heat when exposed to air. A shiva core deals 4d6 ice damage and 4 ice splash damage. On a hit, the target takes a –15-foot status penalty to its Speeds until the end of its next turn. You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.LdmzgBOTjCete4F7]{Effect: Ice Bomb}

Bottled Lightning (Lesser).name: Lightning Mote
Bottled Lightning (Lesser).description:
Activate A Strike

Lightning bombs are packed with volatile reagents that create a blast of electricity when they are exposed to air. A lightning mote deals 1d6 lightning damage and 1 lightning splash damage. On a hit, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of your next turn.

Bottled Lightning (Moderate).name: Coeurl Fragment
Bottled Lightning (Moderate).description:
Activate A Strike

Lightning bombs are packed with volatile reagents that create a blast of electricity when they are exposed to air. A coeurl fragment deals 2d6 lightning damage and 2 lightning splash damage. On a hit, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of your next turn. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls.

Bottled Lightning (Greater).description:
Activate A Strike

Lightning bombs are packed with volatile reagents that create a blast of electricity when they are exposed to air. A yellow gem deals 3d6 lightning damage and 3 lightning splash damage. On a hit, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of your next turn. You gain a +2 item bonus to attack rolls.

Activate A Strike

On a hit, the target becomes @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.AJh5ex99aV6VTggg]{Off-Guard} until the start of your next turn. You gain a +3 item bonus to attack rolls.

Blight Bomb (Lesser).name: Poison Mote
Blight Bomb (Lesser).description:
Activate A Strike

Poison bombs contain some of the most volatile toxic chemicals found on Etheirys. A poison mote deals 1d4 poison damage, 1d4 persistent poison damage, and 1 poison splash damage.

Blight Bomb (Moderate).name: Malboro Fragment
Blight Bomb (Moderate).description:
Activate A Strike

Poison bombs contain some of the most volatile toxic chemicals found on Etheirys. A malboro fragment deals 2d4 poison damage, 2d4 persistent poison damage, and 2 poison splash damage. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls.

Blight Bomb (Greater).description:

Necrotic Bomb (Lesser).name: Shadow Mote
Necrotic Bomb (Lesser).description:
Activate 1 Strike

Shadow bombs combine reagents most people consider disgusting at best and unholy at worst, creating a life-sucking miasma upon contact with air. A shadow mote deals 1d6 shadow damage and 1 shadow splash damage, and on a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 1}. This damage harms only living creatures.

Necrotic Bomb (Moderate).description:
Activate 1 Strike

Shadow bombs combine reagents most people consider disgusting at best and unholy at worst, creating a life-sucking miasma upon contact with air. An ahriman fragment deals 2d6 shadow damage and 2 shadow splash damage, and on a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 2}. This damage harms only living creatures. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls.

Activate 1 Strike

Shadow bombs combine reagents most people consider disgusting at best and unholy at worst, creating a life-sucking miasma upon contact with air. A black gem deals 3d6 shadow damage and 3 shadow splash damage, and on a critical hit, the target is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.fesd1n5eVhpCSS18]{Sickened 3}. Blasting Stone (Lesser).name: Wind Mote
Blasting Stone (Lesser).description:
Activate 1 Strike

When a wind bomb hits a creature or a hard surface, it explodes with a deafening bang. A wind mote deals 1d4 wind damage and 1 wind splash damage, and each creature within 10 feet of the space in which the bomb exploded must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:17|name:Wind Mote|showDC:all] saving throw with the listed DC or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} until the end of its next turn.

Blasting Stone (Moderate).description:
Activate 1 Strike

When a wind bomb hits a creature or a hard surface, it explodes with a deafening bang. A zu fragment deals 2d4 wind damage and 2 wind splash damage, and each creature within 10 feet of the space in which the bomb exploded must succeed at a @Check[fortitude|dc:20|name:Zu Fragment|showDC:all] saving throw with the listed DC or be @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.9PR9y0bi4JPKnHPR]{Deafened} until the end of its next turn. You gain a +1 item bonus to attack rolls.
